scripts.kind: TAG=$(date +%s); deno run docker -- -t imagehost:$TAG; kind load docker-image imagehost:$TAG --name john2143; kubectl set image deployment/john2143-com john2143-com=imagehost:$TAG
scripts.deploy: deno run docker && deno run kind
scripts.startLog: deno run start | tee "logs/`date '+%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S'`.txt" | tee logs/cur
scripts.test1: fish -c 'curl "http://localhost:3000/f/"(curl "https://john2143.com/juush/uploads/1/"(random 100 200) | jq .[]._id -r | head -n (random 1 20) | head -n 1)".png" -o test.png ; timg test.png; rm test.png'
scripts.test2: fish -c 'dd if=/dev/urandom of=test1.bin bs=1M count=1; set url (juush -a -r localhost:3000/uf test1.bin); sleep 1; curl -L $url > test2.bin; shasum test*.bin; rm test*.bin'
